title: 2014 European Senior Tour
text:
The 2014 European Senior Tour was the 23rd season of the <a href="European%20Senior%20Tour">European Senior Tour</a>, the <a href="professional%20golf%20tour">professional golf tour</a> for men aged 50 and above operated by the <a href="PGA%20European%20Tour">PGA European Tour</a>.
Tournament results.
The numbers in brackets after the winners' names show the number of career wins they had on the European Senior Tour up to and including that event. This is only shown for players who are members of the tour.
For the tour schedule on the European Senior Tour's website, including links to full results, click <a href="http%3A//www.europeantour.com/seniortour/tournament/Season%3D2014/index_full.html">here</a>.
Leading money winners.
There is a complete list on the official site <a href="http%3A//www.europeantour.com/seniortour/stats/orderofmerit/index.html">here</a>.
